member.name: T:Plugin.Share.Abstractions.BrowserOptions
member.summary: Platform specific Browser Options

member.name: P:Plugin.Share.Abstractions.BrowserOptions.UseSafariWebViewController
member.summary: iOS: Gets or sets to use the SFSafariWebViewController on iOS 9+ (recommended). Default is true.

member.name: P:Plugin.Share.Abstractions.BrowserOptions.UseSafariReaderMode
member.summary: iOS: Gets or sets to use reader mode (good for markdown files). Default is false.

member.name: P:Plugin.Share.Abstractions.BrowserOptions.SafariBarTintColor
member.summary: iOS: Gets or sets the color to tint the background of the navigation bar and the toolbar (iOS 10+ only). If null (default) the default color will be used.

member.name: P:Plugin.Share.Abstractions.BrowserOptions.SafariControlTintColor
member.summary: iOS: Gets or sets the color to tint the control buttons on the navigation bar and the toolbar (iOS 10+ only). If null (default) the default color will be used.

member.name: P:Plugin.Share.Abstractions.BrowserOptions.ChromeShowTitle
member.summary: Android: Gets or sets to display title as well as url in chrome custom tabs. Default is true

member.name: P:Plugin.Share.Abstractions.BrowserOptions.ChromeToolbarColor
member.summary: Android: Gets or sets the toolbar color of the chrome custom tabs. If null (default) the default color will be used.

member.name: T:Plugin.Share.Abstractions.IShare
member.summary: Interface for Share

member.name: M:Plugin.Share.Abstractions.IShare.OpenBrowser(System.String,Plugin.Share.Abstractions.BrowserOptions)
member.summary: Open a browser to a specific url
member.returns: True if the operation was successful, false otherwise

member.name: M:Plugin.Share.Abstractions.IShare.Share(Plugin.Share.Abstractions.ShareMessage,Plugin.Share.Abstractions.ShareOptions)
member.summary: Share a message with compatible services
member.returns: True if the operation was successful, false otherwise

member.name: M:Plugin.Share.Abstractions.IShare.SetClipboardText(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sets text of the clipboard
member.param: Label to display (not required, Android only)
member.returns: True if the operation was successful, false otherwise

member.name: P:Plugin.Share.Abstractions.IShare.SupportsClipboard
member.summary: Gets if clipboard is supported

member.summary: RGB values of 0-255 for shared

member.name: P:Plugin.Share.Abstractions.ShareColor.A
member.summary: Alpha 0-255

member.name: P:Plugin.Share.Abstractions.ShareColor.G
member.summary: Green 0-255

member.name: P:Plugin.Share.Abstractions.ShareColor.B
member.summary: Blue 0-255

member.name: M:Plugin.Share.Abstractions.ShareColor.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with default values.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified values.

member.name: T:Plugin.Share.Abstractions.ShareMessage
member.summary: Message object to share with compatible services

member.name: P:Plugin.Share.Abstractions.ShareMessage.Title
member.summary: Gets or sets the title of the message. Used as email subject if sharing with mail apps.

member.name: P:Plugin.Share.Abstractions.ShareMessage.Text
member.summary: Gets or sets the text of the message.

member.name: P:Plugin.Share.Abstractions.ShareMessage.Url
member.summary: Gets or sets the link to include with the message.

member.name: T:Plugin.Share.Abstractions.ShareOptions
member.summary: Platform specific Share Options

member.name: P:Plugin.Share.Abstractions.ShareOptions.ChooserTitle
member.summary: Android: Gets or sets the title of the app chooser popup. If null (default) the system default title is used.

member.name: P:Plugin.Share.Abstractions.ShareOptions.ExcludedUIActivityTypes
member.summary: iOS: Gets or sets the UIActivityTypes that should not be displayed. If null (default) the value of is used.

member.name: F:Plugin.Share.Abstractions.ShareUIActivityType.AssignToContact
member.summary: The object assigns the image to a contact.

member.name: F:Plugin.Share.Abstractions.ShareUIActivityType.CopyToPasteboard
member.summary: The object posts the provided content to the pasteboard.

member.name: F:Plugin.Share.Abstractions.ShareUIActivityType.Mail
member.summary: The object posts the provided content to a new email message.

member.name: F:Plugin.Share.Abstractions.ShareUIActivityType.Message
member.summary: The object posts the provided content to the Messages app.

member.name: F:Plugin.Share.Abstractions.ShareUIActivityType.PostToFacebook
member.summary: The object posts the provided content to the user’s wall on Facebook.

member.name: F:Plugin.Share.Abstractions.ShareUIActivityType.PostToTwitter
member.summary: The object posts the provided content to the user’s Twitter feed.

member.name: F:Plugin.Share.Abstractions.ShareUIActivityType.PostToWeibo
member.summary: The object posts the provided content to the user’s Weibo feed.

member.name: F:Plugin.Share.Abstractions.ShareUIActivityType.Print
member.summary: The object prints the provided content.

member.name: F:Plugin.Share.Abstractions.ShareUIActivityType.SaveToCameraRoll
member.summary: The object assigns the image or video to the user’s camera roll.

member.name: F:Plugin.Share.Abstractions.ShareUIActivityType.AddToReadingList
member.summary: The object adds the URL to Safari’s reading list. Supported on iOS 7+ only.

member.name: F:Plugin.Share.Abstractions.ShareUIActivityType.AirDrop
member.summary: The object makes the provided content available via AirDrop. Supported on iOS 7+ only.

member.name: F:Plugin.Share.Abstractions.ShareUIActivityType.PostToFlickr
member.summary: The object posts the provided image to the user’s Flickr account. Supported on iOS 7+ only.

member.name: F:Plugin.Share.Abstractions.ShareUIActivityType.PostToTencentWeibo
member.summary: The object posts the provided content to the user’s Tencent Weibo feed. Supported on iOS 7+ only.

member.name: F:Plugin.Share.Abstractions.ShareUIActivityType.PostToVimeo
member.summary: The object posts the provided video to the user’s Vimeo account. Supported on iOS 7+ only.

member.name: F:Plugin.Share.Abstractions.ShareUIActivityType.OpenInIBooks
member.summary: Supported on iOS 9+ only.
